name: Occupational Hazards
description:
As a station engineer you are in charge of keeping your station in one piece; Unfortunately the space weather forecast predicts lots of asteroids. Keep the station and your better equipped military buddy alive.

Avoid Asteroids as they'll knock you around, keep your ally alive by repairing them with your beam or by running into them, and drag the pieces of the station back by pulling them with your beam or knocking them into place.

WASD/arrows to move
Space to enable your tractor beam and repair beam

Gizmolo: Engine Developer,
Alchemical: Programmer,
JamesVaughan: Programmer,
WiredOverload: Programmer, Art,
Travis Wattigney: Audio
